description: Design mobile bags and cases that better meet the needs and lifestyles of mobile professionals like you. That's the SOLO mission, and it informs every aspect of our business. The SOLO Vintage Collection was designed for upscale men and women with a classic sense of style and taste. The SOLO Vintage Collection iPad Padfolio is a protective case which is custom made to fit your iPad. Constructed with fine Colombian leather, the magnetic frame wakes and sleeps your iPad while holding it securely in place. It includes a separate section with a 5 x 8 inch notepad, business card slots, a slip pocket to hold loose papers, and a pen loop - all to help keep you organized on the go. The Sterling Collection Padfolio is stylish, durable, slim, compact and easy to carry. SOLO offers new freedom to create your own work space, any time and any place. Get the satisfaction, comfort and confidence that come with knowing that you've found the "perfect bag" for you.
title: Solo Vintage Collection Colombian Leather Padfolio for iPad, Fits Generations 1-4, with 5 x 8-Inch Note Pad, Espresso (VTA131-3U6)
